**Welcome!**

This supplementary website details the analysis related to the manuscript:

Heino, M. T. J., Proverbio, D., Resnicow, K., Marchand, G., & Hankonen, N. (2022). *Attractor landscapes: A unifying conceptual model for understanding behaviour change across scales of observation.* Preprint DOI: 10.31234/osf.io/3rxyd

Preprint can be found here: [https://psyarxiv.com/3rxyd/](https://psyarxiv.com/3rxyd/)

Please use the top bar for navigation, and toggle the buttons marked "Code" to display the code used.
